chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> plf m -> Z.div (ec m) 2 = nc m

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
nc = fix nc (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0 | I m0 _ _ _ => nc m0 + 1 | L m0 _ x y => nc m0 - (if eqc_dec m0 x y then 0 else 1) end : fmap -> Z
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z For Zpos: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For Zneg: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
ec = fun m : fmap => nv m + ne m + nf m - nd m : fmap -> Z
plf = fix plf (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 _ _ _ => plf m0 | L m0 zero x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y) | L m0 one x y => plf m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 x (cA m0 zero y)) end : fmap -> Prop
even_ec : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> Zeven (ec m)
Euler_Poincare : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> planar m -> ec m / 2 = nc m
genus_theorem : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> 2 * nc m >= ec m
plf_planar : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> plf m -> planar m
genus = fun m : fmap => nc m - ec m / 2 : fmap -> Z
Z.ones_div_pow2 : forall n m : Z, 0 <= m <= n -> Z.ones n / 2 ^ m = Z.ones (n - m)
expf_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqc m x y
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
Z.ones_add : forall n m : Z, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> Z.ones (m + n) = 2 ^ m * Z.ones n + Z.ones m
inj_neq : forall n m : nat, neq n m -> Zne (Z.of_nat n) (Z.of_nat m)
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Z.div_pow2_bits : forall a n m : Z, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> Z.testbit (a / 2 ^ n) m = Z.testbit a (m + n)
Zne_left : forall n m : Z, Zne n m -> Zne (n + - m) 0
Z.le_antisymm : forall n m : Z, n <= m -> m <= n -> n = m
Z.gcd_mul_mono_l_nonneg : forall n m p : Z, 0 <= p -> Z.gcd (p * n) (p * m) = p * Z.gcd n m
Z.max_r : forall n m : Z, n <= m -> Z.max n m = m
Zegal_left : forall n m : Z, n = m -> n + - m = 0
Z.le_ind : forall A : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : Z, A n -> (forall m : Z, n <= m -> A m -> A (Z.succ m)) -> forall m : Z, n <= m -> A m
fast_Zmult_plus_distr_l : forall (n m p : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (n * p + m * p) -> P ((n + m) * p)
Z.mul_opp_r : forall n m : Z, n * - m = - (n * m)
Z.max_l : forall n m : Z, m <= n -> Z.max n m = n
Z.eq_decidable : forall n m : Z, Decidable.decidable (n = m)
Z.opp_add_distr : forall n m : Z, - (n + m) = - n + - m
Z.pow_succ_r : forall n m : Z, 0 <= m -> n ^ Z.succ m = n * n ^ m
Z.mul_cancel_l : forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> p * n = p * m < -> n = m
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
Z.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : Z, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Z.shiftl_spec : forall a n m : Z, 0 <= m -> Z.testbit (Z.shiftl a n) m = Z.testbit a (m - n)
Z.shiftr_spec : forall a n m : Z, 0 <= m -> Z.testbit (Z.shiftr a n) m = Z.testbit a (m + n)
Z.le_le_succ_r : forall n m : Z, n <= m -> n <= Z.succ m
Znot_ge_lt : forall n m : Z, ~ n >= m -> n < m
Z.div_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.div : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.div
planar = fun m : fmap => genus m = 0 : fmap -> Prop
Zge_left : forall n m : Z, n >= m -> 0 <= n + - m

``` 
intros m H1 H2.
rewrite <- Euler_Poincare with (m := m); auto.
simpl.
rewrite Z.mul_comm.
apply Z.div_mul; auto.
apply Z.lt_le_incl.
apply Z.le_ge.
apply genus_theorem; auto.
```

original: intros m H1 H2. rewrite <- Euler_Poincare with (m := m); auto. simpl. rewrite Z.mul_comm. apply Z.div_mul; auto. apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply Z.le_ge. apply genus_theorem; auto.
